mapper.select: select id, name, use_count from options join trims_options on options.id = trims_options.option_id where trim_id = #{id} order by use_count desc limit 3
select id, name, description, price from trims

select id, name, color_code, choice_ratio, price from external_color join trims_external_color on external_color.id = trims_external_color.external_color_id where trim_id = #{id} order by choice_ratio desc

select id, name, fabric_image, internal_image, price, choice_ratio from internal_color join trims_internal_color on internal_color.id = trims_internal_color.internal_color_id where trim_id = #{id} order by choice_ratio desc, name desc
